item.title: By: tighr10
item.dc:creator: tighr10
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2011/03/12/japanese-members/#comment-19">Kanon Kimura</a>.
Thank you Kanon for commenting directly on the site. Your message will be read by many, stay safe and in touch. Susan
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kanon Kimura.

Thank you Kanon for commenting directly on the site. Your message will be read by many, stay safe and in touch. Susan

item.title: By: Kanon Kimura
item.dc:creator: Kanon Kimura
item.description:
Hi all,
This is Kanon Kimura in Tokyo,Japan. My family and I are well. Thank you for your anxiety.
However, north of Japan has been left in a miserable situation. Mother nature is a threat to beat anyone. I will wrote again after relaxing. I am a hard worker.
item.content:encoded:
Hi all,

This is Kanon Kimura in Tokyo,Japan.
My family and I are well. Thank you for your anxiety.

However, north of Japan has been left in a miserable situation. Mother nature is a threat to beat anyone.
I will wrote again after relaxing. I am a hard worker.

item.title: By: Jill
item.dc:creator: Jill
item.description: Our thoughts are with all those in Japan right now....may our rug hooking friends be safe....Jill
item.content:encoded: Our thoughts are with all those in Japan right now….may our rug hooking friends be safe….Jill
